meanings.sent1: She showed a brazen attitude by talking back to the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The thief had a brazen demeanor as he stole the purse in broad daylight.
meanings.sent3: The brazen squirrel boldly stole nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her brazen lies were like a bright, flashing light in the dark room of truth.
meanings.sent5: The brazen sun blazed in the sky, unapologetically bold and shameless.

meanings.definition: To face or undergo with bold self-assurance
meanings.sent1: He brazened the difficult challenge and emerged victorious.
meanings.sent2: She brazens every obstacle in her path with unwavering determination.
meanings.sent3: The cat brazenly brazens the dog, showing no fear in their playful chase.
meanings.sent4: The student brazened the tough exam like a warrior entering battle.
meanings.sent5: The tree brazenly brazens the storm, standing tall and unyielding in the wind.
